welcome_message_body: Welcome to Puerto La Cruz, Venezuela! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city, known for its stunning beaches, vibrant nightlife, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Puerto La Cruz has to offer.

restaurants.name: Maura
restaurants.description: Maura is a restaurant located in Puerto la Cruz.
restaurants.address: Cl. Ayacucho (Cl. Pinchincha), Puerto la Cruz 6021, Anzoategui
